00054         Scrollbar::Scrollbar(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, UI::ScrollbarStyle Style, UILayer* parent)
00055             : Widget(name, parent),
00056               UpLeftButton(NULL),
00057               DownRightButton(NULL),
00058               ScrollerValue(0),
00059               IncrementDistance(0.1),
00060               ScrollerLock(true),
00061               ScrollBackLock(true),
00062               UpLeftLock(true),
00063               DownRightLock(true)
00064         {
00065             RelPosition = Position;
00066             RelSize = Size;
00067             Type = Widget::Scrollbar;
00068             ScrollStyle = Style;
00069             if(Size.Y > Size.X * 2)
00070             {
00071                 Vector2 ASize = Size * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00072                 CalculateOffsets(ASize);
00073                 CreateVerticalScrollbar(Position, Size);
00074             }
00075             else if(Size.X > Size.Y * 2)
00076             {
00077                 Vector2 ASize = Size * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00078                 CalculateOffsets(ASize);
00079                 CreateHorizontalScrollbar(Position, Size);
00080             }
00081             else
00082             {
00083                 //World::GetWorldPointer()->LogAndThrow("Scrollbar dimensions incompatible with this widget.");
00084             }
00085         }
00086 
00087         Scrollbar::~Scrollbar()
00088         {
00089             delete Scroller;
00090             delete ScrollBack;
00091             delete UpLeftButton;
00092             delete DownRightButton;
00093         }
00094 
00095         void Scrollbar::CreateHorizontalScrollbar(const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size)
00096         {
00097             Horizontal = true;
00098             //Get the size for all items involved
00099             Vector2 ScrollBackSize, LeftButtonSize, RightButtonSize;
00100             if(UI::SB_NoButtons==ScrollStyle)
00101             {
00102                 ScrollBackSize = Size;
00103             }else{
00104                 ScrollBackSize.X = Size.X - (Size.Y * 2);
00105                 ScrollBackSize.Y = Size.Y;
00106                 LeftButtonSize.X = Size.Y;
00107                 LeftButtonSize.Y = Size.Y;
00108                 RightButtonSize.X = Size.Y;
00109                 RightButtonSize.Y = Size.Y;
00110             }
00111             //Get the position for all items involved and configure their offsets
00112             Vector2 ScrollBackPosition, LeftButtonPosition, RightButtonPosition;
00113             if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00114             {
00115                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X;
00116                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00117                 LeftButtonPosition = Position;
00118                 RightButtonPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X + ScrollBackSize.X;
00119                 RightButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00120             }
00121             else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00122             {
00123                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00124                 LeftButtonPosition.X = Position.X + ScrollBackSize.X;
00125                 LeftButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00126                 RightButtonPosition.X = Position.X + ScrollBackSize.X + LeftButtonSize.X;
00127                 RightButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00128             }
00129             else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00130             {
00131                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X + RightButtonSize.X;
00132                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00133                 LeftButtonPosition = Position;
00134                 RightButtonPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X;
00135                 RightButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00136             }
00137             else
00138             {
00139                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00140             }
00141             //Now create the objects, since we have all the position and size data we need
00142             ScrollBack = new Rectangle(ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00143             Scroller = new Button(Name+"SC",ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00144             if(LeftButtonSize.X > 0 && LeftButtonSize.Y > 0)
00145             {
00146                 UpLeftButton = new Button(Name+"LB",LeftButtonPosition,LeftButtonSize,Parent);
00147             }
00148             if(RightButtonSize.X > 0 && RightButtonSize.Y > 0)
00149             {
00150                 DownRightButton = new Button(Name+"RB",RightButtonPosition,RightButtonSize,Parent);
00151             }
00152             CalculateScrollLimits();
00153         }
00154 
00155         void Scrollbar::CreateVerticalScrollbar(const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size)
00156         {
00157             Horizontal = false;
00158             //Get the size for all items involved
00159             Vector2 ScrollBackSize, UpButtonSize, DownButtonSize;
00160             if(UI::SB_NoButtons==ScrollStyle)
00161             {
00162                 ScrollBackSize = Size;
00163             }else{
00164                 ScrollBackSize.X = Size.X;
00165                 ScrollBackSize.Y = Size.Y - (Size.X * 2);
00166                 UpButtonSize.X = Size.X;
00167                 UpButtonSize.Y = Size.X;
00168                 DownButtonSize.X = Size.X;
00169                 DownButtonSize.Y = Size.X;
00170             }
00171             //Get the position for all items involved and configure their offsets
00172             Vector2 ScrollBackPosition, UpButtonPosition, DownButtonPosition;
00173             if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00174             {
00175                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X;
00176                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y;
00177                 UpButtonPosition = Position;
00178                 DownButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00179                 DownButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y + ScrollBackSize.Y;
00180             }
00181             else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00182             {
00183                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00184                 UpButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00185                 UpButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + ScrollBackSize.Y;
00186                 DownButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00187                 DownButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + ScrollBackSize.Y + UpButtonSize.Y;
00188             }
00189             else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00190             {
00191                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X;
00192                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y + DownButtonSize.Y;
00193                 UpButtonPosition = Position;
00194                 DownButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00195                 DownButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y;
00196             }
00197             else
00198             {
00199                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00200             }
00201             //Now create the objects, since we have all the position and size data we need
00202             ScrollBack = new Rectangle(ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00203             Scroller = new Button(Name+"SC",ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00204             if(UpButtonSize.X > 0 && UpButtonSize.Y > 0)
00205             {
00206                 UpLeftButton = new Button(Name+"UB",UpButtonPosition,UpButtonSize,Parent);
00207             }
00208             if(DownButtonSize.X > 0 && DownButtonSize.Y > 0)
00209             {
00210                 DownRightButton = new Button(Name+"DB",DownButtonPosition,DownButtonSize,Parent);
00211             }
00212             CalculateScrollLimits();
00213         }
00214 
00215         bool Scrollbar::IsValidDimensions(const Vector2 &Size)
00216         {
00217             if(Size.X > Size.Y * 2)
00218             {
00219                 return true;
00220             }
00221             else if(Size.Y > Size.X * 2)
00222             {
00223                 return true;
00224             }
00225             return false;
00226         }
00227 
00228         void Scrollbar::SetHorizontal(const Vector2 &Size)
00229         {
00230             if(Size.X > Size.Y * 2)
00231             {
00232                 Horizontal = true;
00233             }
00234             else if(Size.Y > Size.X * 2)
00235             {
00236                 Horizontal = false;
00237             }
00238         }
00239 
00240         void Scrollbar::CalculateOffsets(const Vector2 &Size)
00241         {
00242             if(Horizontal)
00243             {
00244                 if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00245                 {
00246                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(Size.Y,0);
00247                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00248                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2((Size.X - (Size.Y * 2)) + Size.Y,0);
00249                 }
00250                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00251                 {
00252                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00253                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(Size.X - (Size.Y * 2),0);
00254                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2((Size.X - (Size.Y * 2)) + Size.Y,0);
00255                 }
00256                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00257                 {
00258                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(Size.Y * 2,0);
00259                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00260                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(Size.Y,0);
00261                 }
00262             }else{
00263                 if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00264                 {
00265                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,Size.X);
00266                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00267                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(0,(Size.Y - (Size.X * 2)) + Size.X);
00268                 }
00269                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00270                 {
00271                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00272                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,Size.Y - (Size.X * 2));
00273                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(0,(Size.Y - (Size.X * 2)) + Size.X);
00274                 }
00275                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00276                 {
00277                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,Size.X * 2);
00278                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00279                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(0,Size.X);
00280                 }
00281             }
00282         }
00283 
00284         void Scrollbar::CalculateScrollLimits()
00285         {
00286             if(Horizontal)
00287             {
00288                 ScrollerLowerLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().X;
00289                 ScrollerUpperLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().X + ScrollBack->GetActualSize().X;
00290             }else{
00291                 ScrollerLowerLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().Y;
00292                 ScrollerUpperLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().Y + ScrollBack->GetActualSize().Y;
00293             }
00294         }
00295 
00296         void Scrollbar::CalculateScrollValue()
00297         {
00298             Real Pos = 0;
00299             if(Horizontal)
00300             {
00301                 Pos = Scroller->GetActualPosition().X;
00302             }else{
00303                 Pos = Scroller->GetActualPosition().Y;
00304             }
00305             Real RelPos = Pos - ScrollerLowerLimit;
00306             Real RelLimit = ScrollerUpperLimit - ScrollerLowerLimit;
00307             ScrollerValue = RelPos / RelLimit;
00308         }
00309 
00310         void Scrollbar::SetToWithinLimits(Real &Coord)
00311         {
00312             Real SizeOffset = 0;
00313             if(Horizontal)
00314             {
00315                 SizeOffset = Scroller->GetActualSize().X;
00316             }else{
00317                 SizeOffset = Scroller->GetActualSize().Y;
00318             }
00319             if(Coord < ScrollerLowerLimit)
00320             {
00321                 Coord = ScrollerLowerLimit;
00322             }
00323             else if(Coord + SizeOffset > ScrollerUpperLimit)
00324             {
00325                 Coord = ScrollerUpperLimit - SizeOffset;
00326             }
00327         }
00328 
00329         void Scrollbar::SetLocation(const Vector2 &Position)
00330         {
00331             ScrollBack->SetActualPosition(Position + ScrollBackOffset);
00332             CalculateScrollLimits();
00333             Vector2 ScrollVal(0,0);
00334             if(Horizontal)
00335             {
00336                 ScrollVal.X = (ScrollerUpperLimit - ScrollerLowerLimit) * ScrollerValue;
00337             }else{
00338                 ScrollVal.Y = (ScrollerUpperLimit - ScrollerLowerLimit) * ScrollerValue;
00339             }
00340             Scroller->SetActualPosition(Position + ScrollBackOffset + ScrollVal);
00341             if(UpLeftButton)
00342             {
00343                 UpLeftButton->SetActualPosition(Position + UpLeftButtonOffset);
00344             }
00345             if(DownRightButton)
00346             {
00347                 DownRightButton->SetActualPosition(Position + DownRightButtonOffset);
00348             }
00349         }
00350 
00351         void Scrollbar::SetArea(const Vector2 &Size)
00352         {
00353             if(Horizontal)
00354             {
00355                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X - (Size.Y * 2),Size.Y));
00356                 if(UpLeftButton)
00357                 {
00358                     UpLeftButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.Y,Size.Y));
00359                 }
00360                 if(DownRightButton)
00361                 {
00362                     DownRightButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.Y,Size.Y));
00363                 }
00364             }else{
00365                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X,Size.Y - (Size.X * 2)));
00366                 if(UpLeftButton)
00367                 {
00368                     UpLeftButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X,Size.X));
00369                 }
00370                 if(DownRightButton)
00371                 {
00372                     DownRightButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X,Size.X));
00373                 }
00374             }
00375             CalculateScrollLimits();
00376         }
00377 
00378         void Scrollbar::ButtonScroll(bool UpLeft)
00379         {
00380             if((!UpLeftLock && HoveredButton == UpLeftButton) || (!DownRightLock && HoveredButton == DownRightButton))
00381             {
00382                 Vector2 Loc = Scroller->GetActualPosition();
00383                 Real Scroll = ScrollBack->GetActualSize().X * IncrementDistance;
00384                 if(UpLeft)
00385                 {
00386                     Scroll = -Scroll;
00387                 }
00388                 if(Horizontal)
00389                 {
00390                     Loc.X+=Scroll;
00391                     SetToWithinLimits(Loc.X);
00392                 }else{
00393                     Loc.Y+=Scroll;
00394                     SetToWithinLimits(Loc.Y);
00395                 }
00396                 Scroller->SetActualPosition(Loc);
00397             }
00398         }
00399 
00400         void Scrollbar::MouseScroll(Vector2& Scroll)
00401         {
00402             if(!ScrollerLock)
00403             {
00404                 Vector2 Loc = Scroller->GetActualPosition();
00405                 if(Horizontal)
00406                 {
00407                     Scroll.Y = Loc.Y;
00408                     Scroll.X = Loc.X + Scroll.X;
00409                     SetToWithinLimits(Scroll.X);
00410                 }else{
00411                     Scroll.X = Loc.X;
00412                     Scroll.Y = Loc.Y + Scroll.Y;
00413                     SetToWithinLimits(Scroll.Y);
00414                 }
00415                 Scroller->SetActualPosition(Scroll);
00416             }
00417         }
00418 
00419         void Scrollbar::ScrollBackScroll()
00420         {
00421             if(!ScrollBackLock)
00422             {
00423                 Vector2 MousePos = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseCoordinates();
00424                 Vector2 ScPos = Scroller->GetActualPosition();
00425                 Vector2 ScSize = Scroller->GetActualSize();
00426                 if(Horizontal)
00427                 {
00428                     if(MousePos.X < ScPos.X)//left
00429                     {
00430                         ScPos.X = ScPos.X - ScSize.X <= ScrollerLowerLimit ? ScrollerLowerLimit : ScPos.X - ScSize.X ;
00431                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00432                     }
00433                     else if(MousePos.X > ScPos.X + ScSize.X)//right
00434                     {
00435                         ScPos.X = ScPos.X + (ScSize.X * 2) >= ScrollerUpperLimit ? ScrollerUpperLimit - ScSize.X : ScPos.X + (ScSize.X * 2) ;
00436                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00437                     }
00438                 }else{
00439                     if(MousePos.Y < ScPos.Y)//above
00440                     {
00441                         ScPos.Y = ScPos.Y - ScSize.Y <= ScrollerLowerLimit ? ScrollerLowerLimit : ScPos.Y - ScSize.Y ;
00442                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00443                     }
00444                     else if(MousePos.Y > ScPos.Y + ScSize.Y)//below
00445                     {
00446                         ScPos.Y = ScPos.Y + (ScSize.Y * 2) >= ScrollerUpperLimit ? ScrollerUpperLimit - ScSize.Y : ScPos.Y + ScSize.Y ;
00447                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00448                     }
00449                 }
00450             }
00451         }
00452 
00453         void Scrollbar::Update(bool Force)
00454         {
00455             MetaCode::ButtonState State = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00456             if(HoveredButton)
00457             {
00458                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State || MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00459                 {
00460                     if(HoveredButton == Scroller)
00461                     {
00462                         if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00463                         {
00464                             ScrollerLock = false;
00465                         }
00466                         else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00467                         {
00468                             Vector2 Offset = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMousePrevFrameOffset();
00469                             MouseScroll(Offset);
00470                         }
00471                     }
00472                     else if(HoveredButton == UpLeftButton)
00473                     {
00474                         if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00475                         {
00476                             UpLeftLock = false;
00477                         }
00478                         else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00479                         {
00480                             ButtonScroll(true);
00481                         }
00482                     }
00483                     else if(HoveredButton == DownRightButton)
00484                     {
00485                         if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00486                         {
00487                             DownRightLock = false;
00488                         }
00489                         else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00490                         {
00491                             ButtonScroll(false);
00492                         }
00493                     }
00494                 }
00495             }
00496             else if(HoveredBack)
00497             {
00498                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00499                 {
00500                     ScrollBackLock = false;
00501                     ScrollBackScroll();
00502                 }
00503                 else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00504                 {
00505                     if(ScrollBackLock && !ScrollerLock)
00506                     {
00507                         Vector2 Offset = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMousePrevFrameOffset();
00508                         MouseScroll(Offset);
00509                     }else{
00510                         ScrollBackScroll();
00511                     }
00512                 }
00513             }
00514             else if(Force && MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00515             {
00516                 Vector2 Offset = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMousePrevFrameOffset();
00517                 MouseScroll(Offset);
00518             }
00519             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING == State)
00520             {
00521                 ScrollerLock = true;
00522                 ScrollBackLock = true;
00523                 UpLeftLock = true;
00524                 DownRightLock = true;
00525             }
00526             CalculateScrollValue();
00527         }
00528 
00529         void Scrollbar::SetVisible(bool visible)
00530         {
00531             ScrollBack->SetVisible(visible);
00532             Scroller->SetVisible(visible);
00533             if(UpLeftButton)
00534                 UpLeftButton->SetVisible(visible);
00535             if(DownRightButton)
00536                 DownRightButton->SetVisible(visible);
00537             Visible = visible;
00538         }
00539 
00540         bool Scrollbar::IsVisible()
00541         {
00542             return Visible;
00543         }
00544 
00545         void Scrollbar::Show()
00546         {
00547             ScrollBack->Show();
00548             Scroller->Show();
00549             if(UpLeftButton)
00550                 UpLeftButton->Show();
00551             if(DownRightButton)
00552                 DownRightButton->Show();
00553             Visible = true;
00554         }
00555 
00556         void Scrollbar::Hide()
00557         {
00558             ScrollBack->Hide();
00559             Scroller->Hide();
00560             if(UpLeftButton)
00561                 UpLeftButton->Hide();
00562             if(DownRightButton)
00563                 DownRightButton->Hide();
00564             Visible = false;
00565         }
00566 
00567         bool Scrollbar::CheckMouseHover()
00568         {
00569             if(!Visible)
00570                 return false;
00571             if(Scroller->CheckMouseHover())
00572             {
00573                 HoveredButton = Scroller;
00574                 HoveredBack = NULL;
00575                 //Update();
00576                 return true;
00577             }
00578             else if(UpLeftButton->CheckMouseHover())
00579             {
00580                 HoveredButton = UpLeftButton;
00581                 HoveredBack = NULL;
00582                 //Update();
00583                 return true;
00584             }
00585             else if(DownRightButton->CheckMouseHover())
00586             {
00587                 HoveredButton = DownRightButton;
00588                 HoveredBack = NULL;
00589                 //Update();
00590                 return true;
00591             }
00592             else if(ScrollBack->CheckMouseHover())
00593             {
00594                 HoveredButton = NULL;
00595                 HoveredBack = ScrollBack;
00596                 //Update();
00597                 return true;
00598             }
00599             //else
00600             //{
00601             //    HoveredButton = NULL;
00602             //    HoveredBack = NULL;
00603             //    Update();
00604             //    return false;
00605             //}
00606             HoveredButton = NULL;
00607             HoveredBack = NULL;
00608             return false;
00609         }
00610 
00611         Real Scrollbar::GetScrollerValue()
00612         {
00613             return ScrollerValue;
00614         }
00615 
00616         void Scrollbar::SetIncrementDistance(const Real IncDist)
00617         {
00618             IncrementDistance = IncDist;
00619         }
00620 
00621         void Scrollbar::SetScrollerSize(const Real Size)
00622         {
00623             if(Size > 1 || Size < 0)
00624                 return;
00625             Vector2 SB = ScrollBack->GetActualSize();
00626             Vector2 Sc = Scroller->GetActualSize();
00627             if(Horizontal)
00628             {
00629                 Vector2 NewSize(SB.X * Size,Sc.Y);
00630                 Scroller->SetActualSize(NewSize);
00631             }else{
00632                 Vector2 NewSize(Sc.X,SB.Y * Size);
00633                 Scroller->SetActualSize(NewSize);
00634             }
00635         }
00636 
00637         void Scrollbar::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00638         {
00639             RelPosition = Position;
00640             Vector2 Adjusted = Position * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00641             SetLocation(Adjusted);
00642         }
00643 
00644         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetPosition()
00645         {
00646             return RelPosition;
00647         }
00648 
00649         void Scrollbar::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00650         {
00651             RelPosition = Position / Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00652             SetLocation(Position);
00653         }
00654 
00655         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetActualPosition()
00656         {
00657             return (RelPosition * Manager->GetWindowDimensions());
00658         }
00659 
00660         void Scrollbar::SetSize(const Vector2 Size)
00661         {
00662             if(!IsValidDimensions(Size))
00663                 return;
00664             RelSize = Size;
00665             Vector2 Adjusted = Size * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00666             SetHorizontal(Adjusted);
00667             if(ScrollStyle==SB_NoButtons)
00668             {
00669                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Adjusted);
00670             }else{
00671                 Vector2 Loc = RelPosition * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00672                 CalculateOffsets(Adjusted);
00673                 SetArea(Adjusted);
00674                 SetLocation(Loc);
00675             }
00676         }
00677 
00678         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetSize()
00679         {
00680             return RelSize;
00681         }
00682 
00683         void Scrollbar::SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00684         {
00685             if(!IsValidDimensions(Size))
00686                 return;
00687             RelSize = Size / Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00688             SetHorizontal(Size);
00689             if(ScrollStyle==SB_NoButtons)
00690             {
00691                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Size);
00692             }else{
00693                 Vector2 Loc = RelPosition * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00694                 CalculateOffsets(Size);
00695                 SetArea(Size);
00696                 SetLocation(Loc);
00697             }
00698         }
00699 
00700         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetActualSize()
00701         {
00702             return (RelSize * Manager->GetWindowDimensions());
00703         }
00704 
00705         Button* Scrollbar::GetScroller()
00706         {
00707             return Scroller;
00708         }
00709 
00710         Button* Scrollbar::GetUpLeftButton()
00711         {
00712             return UpLeftButton;
00713         }
00714 
00715         Button* Scrollbar::GetDownRightButton()
00716         {
00717             return DownRightButton;
00718         }
00719 
00720         Rectangle* Scrollbar::GetScrollBack()
00721         {
00722             return ScrollBack;
00723         }
00724     }
00725 }
